files.template:
const Pulsar = require('pulsar-client');
(async()=>{ const client = new Pulsar.Client({ serviceUrl:'pulsar://localhost:6650' }); const reader = await client.createReader({ topic:'events', startMessageId: Pulsar.MessageId.earliest() }); const m = await reader.readNext(); console.log(m.getData().toString()); await reader.close(); await client.close(); })();
